poem:
The Endorsement's Whisper

In a house built of words,
   a name is etched
by hands grasping power.
   The hallways of history
   echo with the feet of those 
moving towards the inevitable light.
      Underneath, 
the whispers of an old voice 
   shape new destinies.
      Tomorrow's dawn trembles 
with the weight of hope 
   poised on a name.
